# Elevation-to-color ramp approximating a saturated "Standard" look
# units: meters (ETOPO1). Format: <elev>  R  G  B
# Deep ocean
-11000   0   32   74
-9000    3   51  100
-8000    7   64  110
-7000   12   76  125
-6000   15   88  140
-5000   25  104  154
-4000   35  118  170
-3000   53  136  186
-2000   75  150  194
-1000  100  165  204
-500   130  185  214
-200   150  195  219
-50    166  202  224
